string-array.name: tough_question
string-array.item: 1.Why canâ€™t you run standard Java bytecode on Android?
2. What is the difference between a regular .png and a nine-patch image?
3. There are four Java classes related to the use of sensors on the Android platform. List them and explain the purpose of each?
4. What is difference between Serializable and Parcelable? Which is best approach in Android?
5. How do you supply construction arguments into a Fragment?
6. What is ANR, and why does it happen?
7. How can two Android applications share same Linux user ID and share same VM?
8. How would you check for the presence of a Compass sensor on the system using the hasSystemFeature() method?
